betterquesting:10.desc:8:
After visiting so many of the Shyre Empire's worlds, I believe I have a good idea on who I may encounter after opening my next portals.
The coordinates, they all point to names that were revered in many of the places I have been. Well, their own influence seems to have taken over even Terra. The blessings I would receive back when I first arrived to the Testificates' home world, they come from them, they come from the leaders of the Shyre Empire, the gods of the Shyre Empire.
The Primordials, the Immortals, the appellatives vary, and so do the names associated with the portal locations I will soon be able to open. This suggests some sort of decentralized government, which makes sense, given how high the stakes here are...
